org.nd4j.linalg.primitives

Class SynchronizedObject<T>

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.nd4j.linalg.primitives.SynchronizedObject<T>
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class SynchronizedObject<T>
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    This class is simple holder for provided variable which can be accessed & updated in thread-safe way
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
